svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
March 30, 2024" date: "2024-03-29"
• Latest all core devs – execution (ACDE) call video . Notes from Tim Beiko & Christine Kim : Missed slots : blocks gossiped with missing
blobs, circuit breaker to local building not triggered, base fee variability due to EIP1559 being block rather than time based bloXroute
post mortem : resolved by disabling propagation of blocks containing blobs via their distribution network State & history growth :
Paradigm research : history is 10x state growth Continue work on EIP4444 (history expiry) & provide downloadable history so can stop
serving on p2p Retroactive EIPs: agreed to include EIP7610 (revert contract creation for non-empty storage) and EIP7523 (deprecate empty
accounts) Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024) EIP2537 BLS precompile: gas cost benchmarks Candidate for inclusion : EIP7547 IL
: design issue with account abstraction & options to mitigate Potential EIP updates (no decisions yet, client teams to review, aim to
decide scope at ACDE in 2 weeks) EIP5920 PAY opcode EIP7609 decrease cost of TSTORE/TLOAD EIP2935 save historical block hashes in state
EIP7545 Verkle proof verification precompile EOF (Ethereum Object Format) RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile EIP7664 Access-Key opcode EIP6493
Latest all core devs – execution (ACDE) call video . Notes from Tim Beiko & Christine Kim :
• Missed slots : blocks gossiped with missing blobs, circuit breaker to local building not triggered, base fee variability due to EIP1559
being block rather than time based bloXroute post mortem : resolved by disabling propagation of blocks containing blobs via their
Missed slots : blocks gossiped with missing blobs, circuit breaker to local building not triggered, base fee variability due to EIP1559
being block rather than time based
• bloXroute post mortem : resolved by disabling propagation of blocks containing blobs via their distribution network
• State & history growth : Paradigm research : history is 10x state growth Continue work on EIP4444 (history expiry) & provide
downloadable history so can stop serving on p2p
• Paradigm research : history is 10x state growth
Paradigm research : history is 10x state growth
• Continue work on EIP4444 (history expiry) & provide downloadable history so can stop serving on p2p
Continue work on EIP4444 (history expiry) & provide downloadable history so can stop serving on p2p
• Retroactive EIPs: agreed to include EIP7610 (revert contract creation for non-empty storage) and EIP7523 (deprecate empty accounts)
Retroactive EIPs: agreed to include EIP7610 (revert contract creation for non-empty storage) and EIP7523 (deprecate empty accounts)
• Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024) EIP2537 BLS precompile: gas cost benchmarks Candidate for inclusion : EIP7547 IL :
design issue with account abstraction & options to mitigate Potential EIP updates (no decisions yet, client teams to review, aim to decide
scope at ACDE in 2 weeks) EIP5920 PAY opcode EIP7609 decrease cost of TSTORE/TLOAD EIP2935 save historical block hashes in state EIP7545
Verkle proof verification precompile EOF (Ethereum Object Format) RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile EIP7664 Access-Key opcode EIP6493 SSZ
• EIP2537 BLS precompile: gas cost benchmarks
EIP2537 BLS precompile: gas cost benchmarks
• Candidate for inclusion : EIP7547 IL : design issue with account abstraction & options to mitigate
• EIP7547 IL : design issue with account abstraction & options to mitigate
• Potential EIP updates (no decisions yet, client teams to review, aim to decide scope at ACDE in 2 weeks) EIP5920 PAY opcode EIP7609
decrease cost of TSTORE/TLOAD EIP2935 save historical block hashes in state EIP7545 Verkle proof verification precompile EOF (Ethereum
Object Format) RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile EIP7664 Access-Key opcode EIP6493 SSZ transaction signature scheme
Potential EIP updates (no decisions yet, client teams to review, aim to decide scope at ACDE in 2 weeks)
• EIP2935 save historical block hashes in state
EIP2935 save historical block hashes in state
• EIP7251 maxEB (increase max effective balance): Breakout call video & notes Inactivity leak under maxEB: ejection balance should remain
• Inactivity leak under maxEB: ejection balance should remain as 16 ETH
Inactivity leak under maxEB: ejection balance should remain as 16 ETH
• EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists): Potuz: inclusion lists & EIP3074 incompatibilities
• Verkle: Implementers call video & notes Verkle from genesis devnet-5 live
This newsletter is sponsored by Pashov Audit Group !
What if you can get a good security review from elite security researchers without spending a single penny ?
We offer a FREE pre-audit review on your code.
Our review will check for common vulnerabilities and suggest best practices to ensure that your codebase will get the most out of an
We bet that this free service is better than some that cost 5 figures on the market.
We will be offering this service forever, but if you ping in the following 72hrs after the newsletter is out, you get a guaranteed high
priority for reviewing your code. Reach out - t.me/pashovkrum
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
• 🚨 Lido at 30.11% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
🚨 Lido at 30.11% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
• Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth 66% majority Consensus layer: Prysm 38% plurality Any client bug over
• Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
• Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
• Erigon++ : Silkworm (C++ block execution, RPC & p2p using evmone) running inside Erigon, enabled by command line flag(s), experimental
Erigon++ : Silkworm (C++ block execution, RPC & p2p using evmone) running inside Erigon, enabled by command line flag(s), experimental
• MEV-Boost min-bid provides 7% of censorship resistance : changing to opt-out is simpler alternative to inclusion lists
MEV-Boost min-bid provides 7% of censorship resistance : changing to opt-out is simpler alternative to inclusion lists
• Consensus layer: Lighthouse v5.1.3 : hotfix for duplicate lookup requests and to run fork choice after all block imports Prysm v5.0.2 :
optimizations, UX improvements & bug fixes; defaults to local block if external builder less than 10% additional value Nimbus v24.3.0 :
additional beacon API support, reduces CPU usage & improves resilience; defaults to local block if external builder less than 10%
additional value Teku v24.3.1 : reduces CPU & bandwidth usage; defaults to local block if external builder less than 10% additional value
• Lighthouse v5.1.3 : hotfix for duplicate lookup requests and to run fork choice after all block imports
Lighthouse v5.1.3 : hotfix for duplicate lookup requests and to run fork choice after all block imports
• Prysm v5.0.2 : optimizations, UX improvements & bug fixes; defaults to local block if external builder less than 10% additional value
Prysm v5.0.2 : optimizations, UX improvements & bug fixes; defaults to local block if external builder less than 10% additional value
• Nimbus v24.3.0 : additional beacon API support, reduces CPU usage & improves resilience; defaults to local block if external builder
Nimbus v24.3.0 : additional beacon API support, reduces CPU usage & improves resilience; defaults to local block if external builder less
• Teku v24.3.1 : reduces CPU & bandwidth usage; defaults to local block if external builder less than 10% additional value
Teku v24.3.1 : reduces CPU & bandwidth usage; defaults to local block if external builder less than 10% additional value
• Execution layer: Erigon v2.59.2 : patch for MDBX size/performance regression introduced in v2.58.0 Reth v0.2.0-beta.4 : performance &
• Erigon v2.59.2 : patch for MDBX size/performance regression introduced in v2.58.0
Erigon v2.59.2 : patch for MDBX size/performance regression introduced in v2.58.0
• Vitalik: extend anti-correlation incentives to support decentralized staking
Vitalik: extend anti-correlation incentives to support decentralized staking
• Out-of-protocol blob inclusion pre-confirmations to mitigate blob contention & censorship
Out-of-protocol blob inclusion pre-confirmations to mitigate blob contention & censorship
• Base gas target increased to 3.75mgas/s , planning increase to 5 mgas/s next week
Base gas target increased to 3.75mgas/s , planning increase to 5 mgas/s next week
• Polygon zkEVM outage : synchronizer didn’t detect mainnet reorg, emergency state approved by Security Council to upgrade network
Polygon zkEVM outage : synchronizer didn’t detect mainnet reorg, emergency state approved by Security Council to upgrade network
• Based sequencing & pre-confirmations call video & notes
Based sequencing & pre-confirmations call video & notes
• EIPs: EIP7664 : Access-Key opcode Vitalik’s draft EIPs: Remove identity precompile Raise gas costs of hash functions Remove bloom
• Vitalik’s draft EIPs: Remove identity precompile Raise gas costs of hash functions Remove bloom filters
• Raise gas costs of hash functions
Raise gas costs of hash functions
• ERCs (application layer): ERC7660 : Release tokens on predefined periods ERC7661 : Extended multiphase fractional NFTs ERC7662 : AI
• ERC7660 : Release tokens on predefined periods
ERC7660 : Release tokens on predefined periods
• Remix v0.46.0 : defaults Remix VM EVM version to Cancun & Solidity compiler to v0.8.25
Remix v0.46.0 : defaults Remix VM EVM version to Cancun & Solidity compiler to v0.8.25
• Gaslite Drop deploy ERC20 token using Bytecode20 ( currently can’t verify on Etherscan )
Gaslite Drop deploy ERC20 token using Bytecode20 ( currently can’t verify on Etherscan )
• Lattice MUD v2 (game framework): adds Store (runtime defined storage) & World (contract framework)
Lattice MUD v2 (game framework): adds Store (runtime defined storage) & World (contract framework)
• EthPandaOps Xatu dataset available in Parquet format for mainnet and Sepolia & Holešky testnets
EthPandaOps Xatu dataset available in Parquet format for mainnet and Sepolia & Holešky testnets
• Munchables $62M exploit on Blast by rogue dev, funds returned to multisig
Munchables $62M exploit on Blast by rogue dev, funds returned to multisig
• Prisma Finance $11.6M exploit via unvalidated input, revoke delegate approvals
Prisma Finance $11.6M exploit via unvalidated input, revoke delegate approvals
• Curio $113k exploit on mainnet via flawed voting power access control
Curio $113k exploit on mainnet via flawed voting power access control
• Vitalik: Ethereum after blobs , L1 progress less disruptive for apps, scaling work in the background, apps need to be built for 2020s
Ethereum workflow (e.g. on L2, private & with account abstraction)
Vitalik: Ethereum after blobs , L1 progress less disruptive for apps, scaling work in the background, apps need to be built for 2020s
• EIP7503 (zk wormholes) explainer: mechanism for privacy-preserving transfers
EIP7503 (zk wormholes) explainer: mechanism for privacy-preserving transfers
• Optimism Retro Funding (expanded from public goods) experimenting with impact juries & metrics based evaluation for focused rounds:
onchain builders, OP Stack, governance & dev tooling
Optimism Retro Funding (expanded from public goods) experimenting with impact juries & metrics based evaluation for focused rounds:
• Google search for an address shows balance on Arbitrum One & OP Mainnet as well as mainnet
• Nethermind Mechanism Designer , Protocol Research Manager , Research Engineer
Nethermind Mechanism Designer , Protocol Research Manager , Research Engineer
• Devcon: Community Supporter , Production Magician & Volunteer Coordinator
Devcon: Community Supporter , Production Magician & Volunteer Coordinator
• Certora is hiring: Head of Product , SR-Rust , Compiler Developer & FV Wizard
Certora is hiring: Head of Product , SR-Rust , Compiler Developer & FV Wizard
• 🔥OpenZeppelin seeks Security Researchers in Canada , Australia , LatAm & USA
🔥OpenZeppelin seeks Security Researchers in Canada , Australia , LatAm & USA
• Waku is hiring! Protocol Engineer , Waku SDK Software Engineer & Researcher
Waku is hiring! Protocol Engineer , Waku SDK Software Engineer & Researcher
• IFT / Logos : ZK Researcher (Nomos); ZK Researcher (Vac) & ZK Engineer x2
IFT / Logos : ZK Researcher (Nomos); ZK Researcher (Vac) & ZK Engineer x2
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
• Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 11.2 to 105.5 gwei, with 26.5 gwei average Zero net issuance currently at 22.6 gwei 3k ETH net burn
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 11.2 to 105.5 gwei, with 26.5 gwei average
• Zero net issuance currently at 22.6 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 22.6 gwei
• Blobs being used for inscriptions, activating blob fee market
Blobs being used for inscriptions, activating blob fee market
• Splits multichain : single view of activity across mainnet & Layer 2
Splits multichain : single view of activity across mainnet & Layer 2
• Privacy & Scaling Explorations: Anon Aadhaar v2 adds selective disclosure & simplified nullifier
Privacy & Scaling Explorations: Anon Aadhaar v2 adds selective disclosure & simplified nullifier
• Crypto: The Game (onchain Survivor) season 2 starts April 2, players/jury represented as NFTs
Crypto: The Game (onchain Survivor) season 2 starts April 2, players/jury represented as NFTs
• Alex Pertsev's 2 day trial completed in Netherlands, verdict expected May 14
Alex Pertsev's 2 day trial completed in Netherlands, verdict expected May 14
• KuCoin charged with bank secrecy act & unlicensed money transmission offenses
KuCoin charged with bank secrecy act & unlicensed money transmission offenses
• Beba (apparel) sued SEC, claims free airdrop is not a securities transaction
Beba (apparel) sued SEC, claims free airdrop is not a securities transaction
• ETH correlation analysis in spot ETH ETF filing: strong correlation between spot & futures market
ETH correlation analysis in spot ETH ETF filing: strong correlation between spot & futures market
• Vitalik: memecoins for public goods & creating games/fun
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
• Apr 5-26 – ETHGlobal Scaling Ethereum virtual hackathon
Apr 5-26 – ETHGlobal Scaling Ethereum virtual hackathon
• Jun 14 – EF EIP4844 data challenge deadline
Jun 14 – EF EIP4844 data challenge deadline
Sign up to receive this newsletter weekly
